## matchMediaStylesheetBehaviorFactory() function

Construct a behavior to conditionally apply a stylesheet based on a MediaQueryList

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

    constructListener(this: MatchMediaStyleSheetBehavior, source: (new () => HTMLElement & FASTElement) & {

            prototype: HTMLElement;
```
